Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Considering its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $9,500. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring that you receive a valuable asset at a fair price while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
